verifyDialog.title: CLI Support Simulation
verifyDialog.idleHint: Select a token, then run the simulation. Provide a model id if the token cannot be used to infer one.
verifyDialog.warning: This feature is Beta. A detected pass is likely real; a fail may still work in some clients. Treat the result as guidance and verify with the actual CLI when possible.
verifyDialog.requiresModelId: Provide a model id before running this check.
verifyDialog.unsupportedToolForApiType: The selected API type does not support {{tool}} simulation.

summaries.noToolCallDetected: No tool call detected (tool calling may not be supported)
summaries.unauthorized: Unauthorized (401): invalid key or missing auth
summaries.endpointNotFound: Endpoint not found (404): this API may not be supported
